```{r, cache=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmap)
library(ggrepel)

rm(list=ls())

source("./src/downloadPositions.R")
source("./src/downloadClassData.R")


pos <- left_join(pos, results)


lkhuron <- get_map(location = "Lake Huron", zoom=7)




```

```{r, cache=TRUE}

pos <- pos[pos$place != "RET", ]
classo <- pos %>% filter(class=="Class O Class")

ggmap(lkhuron)+
  geom_path(data=classo, aes(x=lon, y=lat, color=boat))+ 
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-84.5, -82))+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(43, 46))

```


```{r}

classo <- pos %>% filter(class=="Class O Class")

ggplot(classo)+geom_path(aes(x=GpsAt, y=SOG, color=boat))+scale_y_continuous(limits=c(0, 7))


```

```{r}

classo$day <- format(classo$GpsAt, "%F")

ggplot(classo[classo$day=="2018-07-14", ])+geom_path(aes(x=GpsAt, y=cumd, color=boat))



```
